Detailed Description

Creates a CPGraph instance formatted with predefined themes.

+ (CPTheme *) themeNamed: (NSString *)  themeName  

Gets a named theme.

Parameters:
themeName The name of the desired theme.
Returns:
A CPTheme instance with name matching themeName or nil if no themes with a matching name were found.
